summary: Analyzed <leader>ac picker coverage of .claude/ directory. Found 3 gaps: agents/ directory is completely missing, context/ and rules/ are only in sync (not picker UI). The lib/ directory referenced in code does not exist. Recommendations: Priority 1 is adding agents/ support (9 active agents), Priority 2 is adding context/ and rules/ to picker UI for consistency.

artifacts.summary: Research report analyzing picker coverage, gap analysis, and implementation recommendations

next_steps: Run /plan 23 to create implementation plan for adding missing directory support
